steps: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with butter
Mix the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl and the wet ingredients in a medium one. Combine and mix until smooth; keep the medium bowl. Pour into the baking dish
In the medium mixing bowl, combine the brown sugar and cinnamon for the topping. Drizzle the melted butter into the mix and stir until it looks like sand
> Spoon the cinnamon mixture over the batter and use a knife to swirl it in
Bake for 25-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean
title: Coffee Cake
